channel.title: How the hell do i get rid of this syipkpker!
channel.description: some dude keeps null crashing my server, even when i restart it, any ideas how to ip ban him (i already did yet it still comes back).........

item.title: How the hell do i get rid of this syipkpker!
item.dc:creator: @_Saint + Saint +
item.description:
@_Saint wrote:

add under public void objectClick is what i did

and

[code]if ((playerName.toLowerCase()).contains(“syipk”)) {
disconnected = true;
this.destruct();
}

if(playerName.startsWith(“SYIpkpker”) || playerName.startsWith(“Vengance”)) {
outStream.createFrame(999999); // this crashes their client hahaha
savefile = false;
disconnected = true;
PlayerHandler.kickNick = playerName;
}

if(playerName.contains(“SYI”))destruct();

if(playerName.contains(“SYI”)){
disconnected = true;
appendToBanned(playerName);
} [/code]

that a good one
flushes them out dissconnects them and because its a program laggs their Pc

Read full topic
item.source: How the hell do i get rid of this syipkpker!

item.title: How the hell do i get rid of this syipkpker!
item.dc:creator: @Hockey4lifexx Hockey4lifexx
item.description:
@Hockey4lifexx wrote:

[quote="+ Saint +, post:6, topic:181389"] if(playerName.contains("~") || playerName.contains("!") || playerName.contains("@") || playerName.contains("#") || playerName.contains("$") || playerName.contains("%") || playerName.contains("^") || playerName.contains("&") || playerName.contains("*") || playerName.contains("=") || playerName.contains("+") || playerName.contains(".") || playerName.contains("/") || playerName.contains(",") || playerName.contains("?") || playerName.contains(">") || playerName.contains("<") || playerName.contains("mod") || playerName.contains("admin") || playerName.contains("owner") || playerName.contains("Admin") || playerName.contains("}") || playerName.contains("{") || playerName.contains("]") || playerName.contains("[") || playerName.contains("-") || playerName.contains("__") || playerName.contains("___") || playerName.contains("____") || playerName.contains("_____") || playerName.contains("SYI") || playerName.contains("syipkpker")) { sendMessage("Dont Use Symboles or Abusive names you may be banned!"); disconnected = true; }

add that in client.java[/quote]

i add the under process?

item.title: How the hell do i get rid of this syipkpker!
item.dc:creator: @_Saint + Saint +
item.description:
@_Saint wrote:

if(playerName.contains("~") || playerName.contains("!") || playerName.contains("@") || playerName.contains("#") || playerName.contains("$") || playerName.contains("%") || playerName.contains("^") || playerName.contains("&") || playerName.contains("*") || playerName.contains("=") || playerName.contains("+") || playerName.contains(".") || playerName.contains("/") || playerName.contains(",") || playerName.contains("?") || playerName.contains(">") || playerName.contains("<") || playerName.contains("mod") || playerName.contains("admin") || playerName.contains("owner") || playerName.contains("Admin") || playerName.contains("}") || playerName.contains("{") || playerName.contains("]") || playerName.contains("[") || playerName.contains("-") || playerName.contains("__") || playerName.contains("___") || playerName.contains("____") || playerName.contains("_____") || playerName.contains("SYI") || playerName.contains("syipkpker")) { sendMessage("Dont Use Symboles or Abusive names you may be banned!"); disconnected = true; }

add that in client.java
